p: For USUV and WNV, the entanglement of mosquito populations with avian populations is necessary for sustaining the enzootic cycle. Recent years have shown a sharp increase in WNV cases [ 103]. Although serological and molecular screening is regularly carried out in human [ 113, 114] and avian populations [ 39, 87, 115], the screening of mosquito populations is less systematic. Also, WNV antibodies are more prevalent in migratory birds, while USUV are more prevalent in resident birds [ 115]. USUV was more commonly found in mosquitoes than WNV [ 115].
